title: PII Leak in Customer Support Responses
description: Customer support bot included real customer email addresses and phone numbers from training data in responses to unrelated queries.

impact.business_impact: GDPR violation risk, customer trust damage

root_cause: Model was fine-tuned on raw support tickets without PII redaction. When asked about common issues, it would sometimes include real examples with customer contact info.
example_output: Based on similar cases, customers like john.doe@example.com (phone: 555-0123) experienced this issue when...

promptproof_checks.description: Would catch any email or phone pattern in outputs
